thread.title: Good location and very comfortable
thread.title_full: Good location and very comfortable - Review of Hotel Turenne Le Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rsartist2015
title: Good location and very comfortable
text:
Perfect location for a weekend in Paris - right next to metro and bus stops but also easy to walk everywhere. Very helpful staff - upgraded us to a better room at the back for the second night. Chose the hotel for its comfortable bed, cleanliness, good lighting, wifi etc even though we knew we'd be out all day! Has everything you need for your comfort - toiletries, tea/coffee/kettle, hair dryer etc. But it's not a "French style" hotel with chintzy wall paper & antique furniture etc - more a business style. Had breakfast in a cafe round the corner - seems too expensive to eat in the hotel when there are so many places nearby. Negatives are: Very small room (but typical of Paris and you'll be out all day...) and very small shower room. (You'll struggle to fit in if you're large or tall!). The rooms at the back of the hotel (one per floor) are very slightly larger and have a proper sized bathroom (shower within the bath, not a cubicle). Don't bring large suitcases as space is limited. Weekend luggage is fine!
